text: Patrick André Leclercq (born 2 August 1938) is a Monegasque politician. He was the Minister of State of Monaco. He was chosen by Rainier III, Prince of Monaco in December 1999 to replace Michel Lévêque. He was an Ambassador to France, Spain, Egypt (Jordan), Montreal (Canada), as well as in the Foreign Ministry. He retired in May 2005. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Ambassadors to France Category:Ministers of State of Monaco
title: Patrick Leclercq
